answers.answer: It depends on your Dr. Mine will see me weekly at 36 weeks.

Def depends on doc and mom... my doc doesn't plan on me going in every two weeks... my next app I'll be 32 weeks than he wants me in at my 36 than my 40 week... but this is my fourth and my only issue I've had was at 37 weeks and low fluid so it'll stay by ear. I prefer not going in evwry two weeks though I travel an hour and a half....
Depends on the Dr. I started seeing my Dr weekly at 32 weeks because I have gestational diabetes. So it depends on Dr and/our health conditions if any.
I start going weekly at 37 weeks
sadly ive had weekly visits since i was 12 weeks , im 29 weeks now.

question: When do women typically start having to go to ob appointments weekly, im still in second trimester
title: 20 weeks 6 days
